title: Northern Road Connectivity Project - Award of Contract for the Rehabilitation/Improvement of Mannar End approach of 'Sangupity' Bridge (4.5 km) on Navatkuli - Keraitivu - Mannar Road (A32)
decision_details: - the proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Highways, Ports and Shipping, to award the above contract to the lowest evaluated substantially responsive bidder at a cost of Rs.1,119 million, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
